```{r, echo = FALSE, fit.align = 'center'}
viz_paths <- here::here("static", "dataviz") %>%
  fs::dir_info() %>%
  arrange(modification_time) %>%
  pull(path) %>%
  str_match("static/dataviz/.*") %>%
  `[`(,1) %>% 
  rev()

knitr::include_graphics(viz_paths)
```
